SELECT c.id, c.content, c.article_id, c.user_id, c.created_at, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, u.sex FROM comment AS c LEFT JOIN user AS u ON u.id = c.user_id
c.article_id = #{id} AND c.deleted = 0
AND (u.username LIKE "%${name}%" OR u.nickname LIKE "%${name}%")
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{start},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.created_at,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY c.created_at DESC

SELECT c.id, c.content, c.article_id, c.user_id, c.created_at, a.title AS article_title, u.username, u.nickname FROM comment AS c LEFT JOIN article AS a ON a.id = c.article_id LEFT JOIN user AS u ON u.id = c.user_id WHERE c.deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT cr.id, cr.content, cr.comment_id, cr.comment_reply_id, cr.type, cr.created_at, fu.id AS from_user_id, fu.username AS from_username, fu.nickname AS from_nickname, fu.avatar AS from_avatar, fu.sex AS from_sex, fu.author as from_author, tu.id AS to_user_id, tu.username AS to_username, tu.nickname AS to_nickname, tu.avatar AS to_avatar, tu.sex AS to_sex, tu.author as to_author FROM comment__reply AS cr LEFT JOIN comment AS c ON c.id = cr.comment_id LEFT JOIN user AS fu ON fu.id = cr.from_user_id LEFT JOIN user AS tu ON tu.id = cr.to_user_id WHERE cr.deleted = 0 AND cr.comment_id = #{id} ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC

SELECT c.id, c.content, c.article_id, c.user_id, c.created_at, c.author, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, u.sex FROM comment AS c LEFT JOIN user AS u ON u.id = c.user_id WHERE c.article_id = #{id} AND c.deleted = 0 ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
